description: Write a function that checks if a `hostname` (or any of its labels) starts or ends with a hyphen '-'. Example (Invalid): hostname_has_hyphen_start_end("-ex.com") -> 1. Example (Invalid): hostname_has_hyphen_start_end("ex.com-") -> 1. Example (Valid): hostname_has_hyphen_start_end("my-host.com") -> 0.
